lines.text: You are not a true Black Pearl anyway. A true Black Pearl doesn't need a gun. But sometimes like to use them, just for fun.
Why do I have to do it Saalamar?
Because, I say so. It can be done?
Just get it done. It's important. It's very important.
I thought you quit this shit!
Hello Ying. How are you doing?
Peng! Get your feet of the bleeding desk! We're getting more and more complaints about the drug addicts, and I want to know what're you bloody well going to do about it.
We're working on it sir. We're getting close on some things.
All you think about is entering those *stupid* tournaments and chewing that *stupid* gum!

[apathetically]
Really sir, somethings are coming together.
Enough rubbish. I'm going to stay on your ass until you begin to achieve something. Or I'll have you off this case.
